history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified,Rdiv_plus_distr. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified,Rmult_assoc,Rdiv_plus_distr. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified,Rmult_assoc,Rinv_r_sym,Rdiv_plus_distr. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified,Rinv_r_sym,Rdiv_plus_distr,Rmult_1_l,Rmult_assoc. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified,Rinv_r_sym,Rdiv_plus_distr,Rmult_plus_distr_l,Rmult_1_l,Rmult_assoc. srun best use: Rmax_assoc.

exceptions.tactic: intros a b c d H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The reference b was not found in the current environment.

Found no subterm matching "?M2445 / ?M2447 + ?M2446 / ?M2447" in the current goal.

exceptions.tactic: replace ((a * d + c * b) / (b * d) * (b * d)) with (a * d + c * b).

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rmult_eq_reg_l with (r := b * d). -- apply Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified; auto. -- rewrite <- Rdiv_plus_distr. replace ((a * d + c * b) / (b * d) * (b * d)) with (a * d + c * b). ++ rewrite <- (Rinv_l_sym (b * d)); auto. rewrite <- Rmult_assoc. rewrite Rinv_r_sym; auto. rewrite Rmult_1_l. rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_l.
